post.body: I already have a craving for one of their smooothies!
sounds good!! A friend mentioned a new vegan restaurant in Burlington... do you know what that would be? curious!
yeah! make something awesome.
yeah, but... you'll look really cool until someone wants to know what time it is!
you are welcome. this is a season to give thanks and remember the cheese.
thanks! & good for you with the sales in Miami!
dang it. Wanted to meet him.
oh no! Missed your tweet. Spending gift cards in SB now. Enjoy the holiday gloating!
yay!! what fruit do you have? its a cute game.
this girl's stuff reminds me of your stuff http://tinyurl.com/aydz7f
I totally just had a candybar for dinner. responsible!
just finished submitting a portfolio via slideroom.com - surprisingly nice experience. ahhhhhh. 2 down, 11 to go!
working working working! If I manage to complete things quickly I can drive up to VT and enjoy the COLDNESS.
if I had 3 wishes I would probably waste 1 on unlimited polaroid film for the rest of my life... maybe money would be more practical.
had to wake up from strange dreams of breaking in places & students with hat sculptures.
mmmm. delivery. again. I think if i moved somewhere without it my body would drop 20 lbs out of fear alone.
playing with my new POLGA thanks to N! Also http://tinyurl.com/6k875h this cute one!!
BRR! Its snowing and the church down the street is playing a church bell christmas song over the whole neighborhood. pretty ✵❉✽❆✽❆✽❉
I'm in love with a polaroid camera. ♥♥♥
I am fake awake. Going to go pretend sit on the couch.
freaking awesome vintage dress. http://tinyurl.com/5drsk2 classy. someday I'll be classy
kichi decided what he wants for christmas http://tinyurl.com/6bh4eb and also cheese.
nooka watches are cute. http://nooka.com/ back from a bit of shopping/eating. now I should be working!
cube zero is most worst movie of EVER. 4L. Feel like I need to wash my brain.
You know what's scary right now? Red square.
Dance floor is packed. Check out my ladies http://snipurl.com/96dxp
What do you consiider fun? Fun natural fun!
Going to 80s night with or without my posse.
At the reunion OMG. Blahrg
going into burlington for 80's nite & HS reunion. I made this money. you didn't. right ted? we outta here.
The wind might blow our house away! Hanging out at the cat farm & wishing michael was here to help me spend my pure pop gift cert. COFFEEz
Eating nachos in the car is difficult- but not as difficult as not eating nachos in the car.
Looking for a fake boyfriend to go to my reunion. Can you: speak w/ german accent? Pretend to be a doctor? Act cool? Projectile vomit?
Going to the new ethnic cafe with sharonz
Amateur surgeon is the funnest game for the iPhone so far! (or maybe I just have weird taste)
Merry merry xmasz. Now for a diabetic coma in my nest of gifts. Mmmmm
iPhone in VT is the top story in the free press. http://snipurl.com/938mi
I want to open gifts early. Kichi says me too me too !!! http://snipurl.com/938h5
It's Christmas cookie time. Toooo many cookies http://snipurl.com/934je
why do the times when I eat the most calories and expend the least calories coincide so nicely? today=eat things and sit there.
